EmailTemplate.description: Used on IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR Process
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Setup Finalization Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – IEP Bank Account Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please be informed that your Bank Account registration is now completed. You can now use this Bank Account to funds your EasyPay wallet(s). Don’t hesitate to contact the IATA Customer Service team for more information.
Thank you. IATA Customer Service Portal
